short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates electricity costs and redirects to the detailed calculator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Electricity Cost Calculator - Estimate Your Energy Usage and Costs Easily

Looking to reduce your electricity bills? The Electricity Cost Calculator is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you calculate your energy costs quickly and accurately. Whether it's for home appliances, office equipment, or any electrical device, this extension makes it easy to understand your daily and monthly electricity expenses.

Key Features:
Accurate Energy Cost Calculation: Input your device's power usage (in watts), daily usage hours, and electricity rate (cost per kWh) to instantly calculate your daily and monthly electricity costs.
Save on Electricity Bills: Understand your electricity consumption to make informed decisions on how to save energy and reduce your monthly bills.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple input fields with real-time cost results displayed right in the extension.
Quick Access to Advanced Calculator: After calculating your energy usage, instantly redirect to a detailed electricity calculator for more insights.
Perfect for homeowners, renters, or businesses looking to manage their energy consumption, this extension is your go-to tool for optimizing electricity use and cutting costs.
